ValidationRule.description: In order to avoid errors, limited particular status updates to only the NI IMT Global Training (Knowledge) profile.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Profile.Name != "NI IMT Global Training (Knowledge)", OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Approved"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Retired")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please contact the Knowledge team when using this value
